## Description {#details}

Macro Info DWARF-like metadata node.

A metadata node with a DWARF macro info (i.e., a constant named <code>DW&#95;MACINFO&#95;&#42;</code>, defined in <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/dwarf-h">llvm/BinaryFormat/Dwarf.h</a>). Called <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dimacronode">DIMacroNode</a></em> because it&#39;s potentially used for non-DWARF output.

Uses the SubclassData16 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> slot.

Definition at line 3810 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
